item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, April 6, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Rsync replaced with openrsync on macOS Sequoia (81 points | 67 comments)

3. U.S. stock futures tumble indicating another plummet on Wall Street (34 points | 1 comment)

27. Thomas Rattigan, short-lived Commodore CEO (43 points | 12 comments)
28. Breaking computers taught me to build them (42 points | 46 comments)
29. My Browser WASM't Prepared for This. Using DuckDB, Apache Arrow and Web Workers (101 points | 22 comments)
30. Kilmar Garcia et al. vs. US Department of Homeland Security et al. (4 points | discuss)
